about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling atmosphere of "1 Shot 1 Kill" through its captivating original soundtrack, masterfully crafted by renowned video game composer Scott Lord. This soundtrack is a collection of dynamic tracks that perfectly encapsulate the essence of each level, ensuring an audibly exhilarating experience.

Soundtrack Features

  • Echoes of Tomorrow: Discover the sweeping melodies of the overture and the ambient sounds of various menus including the Start Menu, Level Select, Options, Pause, and Credits.
  • Hyperian Glory: Feel the adrenaline with the upbeat rhythms of the Scoreboard and Victory menus.
  • Silicon Souls: Delve into the digital world with themes tailored for the Evil AI, featuring a mix inspired by electronic music legends.
  • Con-Troll Overdrive: Battle the AI Bosses and Olu Alien boss with tracks that enhance the tension and excitement.
  • Catchfools Serenade: Explore the cyberpunk cityscapes with melodies that evoke a futuristic vibe.
  • Nexos Prime: Confront the Drone Boss with a track that sets the perfect backdrop for intense gameplay.
  • Revenant Rising: Journey through spaceship themed levels with a soundtrack inspired by epic space operas.
  • The Wrath of Adrik: Face off against Tank Boss, Mecha-Adrik with powerful, thematic music.
  • Dawn of the Red Vanguard: Experience the influence of Japanese themes in the battles within SS Liberator and Crimson Sanctum.
  • Shogunator Showdown: Engage in mech battles against a Samurai Mech with tunes that match the intensity.
  • Curse of the Crestal: Navigate through horror-themed levels with a soundtrack that enhances the eerie atmosphere.
  • Malakarth Summoned: Stand against the formidable Malakarth with a track that brings his demonic presence to life.
  • Velocity of the Void: Experience the time trials with music that keeps the pace fast and the stakes high.

Each track is carefully designed to support the unique themes and challenges of the levels, enhancing the immersive experience of the game.

Feel the Music

Whether you are navigating through intense battles or exploring intriguing environments, this soundtrack is your perfect companion. Enhance your gaming experience with the sounds of "1 Shot 1 Kill," available now on Steam.
